trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable option displayed on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma opção selecionável exibida em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Although <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> replaces and adds functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> substitua e adicione funcionalidade ao controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> de versões anteriores, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e uso futuro, se desejado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> that works with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> to handle the special highlighting, layout, and column arrangement for menus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> que funciona com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> para lidar com a disposição de realce, o layout e a coluna especial para os menus.

trans-unit.source: In order for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> to be displayed, you must add it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Para que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> para serem exibidos, você deve adicioná-lo para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> classe fornece propriedades que permitem que você configure a aparência e a funcionalidade de um item de menu.

trans-unit.source: To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir uma marca de seleção ao lado de um item de menu, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items.
trans-unit.target: Use este recurso para identificar um item de menu é selecionado em uma lista de itens de menu mutuamente exclusivos.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A> property to identify which color is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver um conjunto de itens de menu para definir a cor do texto em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlar, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A> propriedade para identificar qual cor está selecionado no momento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeys%2A> property to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeys%2A> propriedade para definir uma combinação de teclado que pode ser pressionada para selecionar o item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeyDisplayString%2A> to the specified menu items of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeyDisplayString%2A> para os itens de menu especificado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> class that displays the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> que exibe a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> that displays an image in the margin alongside the text.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> que exibe uma imagem na margem ao lado do texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no item de menu.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> class that displays the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> que exibe o texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um uso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> class that displays the specified text and image.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> with the specified name and image.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> com o nome especificado e a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que gera o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> ao clicar no controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> class that displays the specified text and image and that does the specified action when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados e que realiza a ação especificada ao clicar em <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> that displays both text and an image and that does the specified action when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> que exibe o texto e uma imagem e o que faz a ação especificada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um uso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: The menu items to display when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Os itens de menu a serem exibidos quando o controle recebe um clique.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> class that displays the specified text and image and that contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados e que contém a coleção <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> that displays text and an image and that contains the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> que exibe o texto e imagem e que contém especificado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que gera o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> ao clicar no controle.

trans-unit.source: The name of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: O nome do item de menu.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> class with the specified name that displays the specified text and image that does the specified action when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> com o nome especificado que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados que realizam a ação especificada ao clicar em <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um uso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que gera o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> ao clicar no controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> that represents the shortcut key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> que representa a tecla de atalho para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> class that displays the specified text and image, does the specified action when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is clicked, and displays the specified shortcut keys.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados, que realiza a ação especificada quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> recebe um clique e que exibe as teclas de atalho especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> that displays text and an image, performs the specified action when clicked, and has the specified shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%2A> construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> que exibe texto e imagem, executa a ação especificada quando clicado e possui a tecla de atalho especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> está verificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is checked or is in an indeterminate state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> está verificado ou está em um estado indeterminado, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A> property returns `false` if and only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is unchecked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A> propriedade retorna `false` se e somente se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> está desmarcada.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, when an item is checked or indeterminate, the corresponding icon may be resized.
trans-unit.target: Começando com o .NET Framework 4.5.2, quando um item é marcada ou indeterminado, o ícone correspondente pode ser redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: Redimensionando é determinado pela configuração de DPI do sistema quando o arquivo App. config contém a seguinte entrada:

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckedChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckedChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> named `ToolStripMenuItem1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> chamado `ToolStripMenuItem1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckedChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckedChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> should automatically appear checked and unchecked when clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> deve aparecer automaticamente pressionado e não pressionado quando clicado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> should automatically appear checked when clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> deve ser exibida automaticamente marcada quando clicado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is in the checked, unchecked, or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> está no estado marcado, desmarcado ou indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Unchecked" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="Unchecked" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState%2A> property to control or determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is initially checked, unchecked, or in an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState%2A> para controlar ou determinar se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> inicialmente estiver marcada, não verificado, ou em um estado indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Checked> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>, the corresponding icon may be resized.
trans-unit.target: Começando com o .NET Framework 4.5.2, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Checked> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>, o ícone correspondente pode ser redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: Redimensionando é determinado pela configuração de DPI do sistema quando o arquivo App. config contém a seguinte entrada:

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState" /> property is not set to one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState" /> não é definida como um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckStateChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> named `ToolStripMenuItem1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> chamado `ToolStripMenuItem1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckStateChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method to create an accessibility-aware chart control, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes to expose accessible information.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra substituindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método para criar um gráfico com reconhecimento de acessibilidade controlar, usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes para expor informações acessíveis.

trans-unit.source: The control plots two curves along with a legend.
trans-unit.target: O controle plota duas curvas junto com uma legenda.

trans-unit.source: The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control.
trans-unit.target: O `ChartControlAccessibleObject` classe que deriva de `ControlAccessibleObject`, é usado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método para fornecer informações acessíveis personalizadas para o controle de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Because the chart legend is not an actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>-based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information.
trans-unit.target: Porque a legenda do gráfico não é um real <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>-com base em controle, mas em vez disso, é desenhado pelo controle do gráfico, ele faz não todas as informações acessíveis internas.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, o `ChartControlAccessibleObject` substituições de classe a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> método para retornar o `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` que representa informações acessíveis para cada parte da legenda.

trans-unit.source: When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information.
trans-unit.target: Quando um aplicativo acessível ciente usa esse controle, o controle pode fornecer as informações necessárias de acessíveis.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a complete code example that can be found at the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo de código completo que pode ser encontrado na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a generic <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> genérico para o qual os eventos podem ser definidos.

trans-unit.source: A generic <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> for which can be defined.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> genérico para o qual pode ser definido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> method is automatically called if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property finds no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> método é chamado automaticamente se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> propriedade localiza não <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> associado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> and an adjacent item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento entre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> e um item adjacente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value representing the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> valor que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento interno dentro do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value representing the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> valor que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho padrão do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />, measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />, medido em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100 pixels horizontally.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 100 pixels horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.DefaultSize%2A> in derived classes to configure a default size for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.DefaultSize%2A> em classes para definir um tamanho padrão para derivadas um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient than setting the size in the control's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Isso é mais eficiente do que a definição do tamanho no construtor do controle.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o controle estiver habilitado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> appears on a multiple document interface (MDI) window list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> é exibido em uma lista de janelas da MDI (interface de vários documentos).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> appears on a MDI window list; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> aparece em uma lista de janelas MDI; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> must be specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> devem ser especificados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckedChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckedChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnCheckedChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnCheckedChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnMouseUp%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnMouseUp%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnOwnerChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnOwnerChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnOwnerChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnOwnerChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnOwnerChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnOwnerChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnPaint%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnPaint%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is attached to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton" /> or whether it can float between the two.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> está anexado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> ou ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton" /> ou se ele pode flutuar entre os dois.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Never" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="Never" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, which represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> que representa a chave a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o caractere foi processado pelo controle; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caractere mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o caractere tiver sido processado como mnemônico pelo controle; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: para todas as janelas de herança de classes para chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see langword="AllWindows" /> valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the size and location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa o tamanho e o local do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size and location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho e o local do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut key text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto da tecla de atalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa a tecla de atalho.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get or set the text that is displayed as the shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para obter ou definir o texto que é exibido como tecla de atalho.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the specified text to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeyDisplayString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir atribui o texto especificado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeyDisplayString%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut keys associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as teclas de atalho associadas ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.None" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.None" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeys%2A> property to assign a key combination to a menu command, such as CTRL+C for the **Copy** command.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeys%2A> propriedade para atribuir uma combinação de teclas para um comando de menu, como CTRL + C para o **cópia** comando.

trans-unit.source: You can use shortcut keys instead of or in addition to access keys, which are underscored letters in menus or menu items used with the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar as teclas de atalho em vez de ou além das chaves de acesso, que são letras sublinhadas menus ou itens de menu usados com a tecla ALT.

trans-unit.source: Define access keys in code by typing an ampersand (&) before the letter you want to use for an access key.
trans-unit.target: Defina chaves de acesso no código, digitando um e comercial (&) antes da letra que você deseja usar para uma chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeys%2A> property to assign the key combination CTRL+P to a menu item called `printToolStripMenuItem`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeys%2A> propriedade para atribuir a combinação de teclas CTRL + P para um item de menu chamado `printToolStripMenuItem`.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [como: adicionar recursos do navegador da Web para um aplicativo do Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).

trans-unit.source: The property was not set to one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade não foi definida como um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the shortcut keys that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> are displayed next to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as teclas de atalho associadas ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> são exibidas ao lado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the shortcut keys are shown; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se as teclas de atalho são mostradas; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.
